title: QUICK Kassadin or Anivia?
body: Thanks to a beautiful S i finally got on singed, i opened a hextech chest to find the last champion shard i need. So kassadin or anivia? or should i re roll it with my other champion shard, jayce, to a random one?

replies.body: Anivia is one of the best champions in the game at the moment.

I'd not complete shards into 3150 or less Champions.  If you buy all champions 3150 and lower, I am personally waiting for that until I start rring the 3 shards thing so I'm guaranteed a 4800+... then when I'm done with 4800, i'm going to buy shards 3 at a time to get a 6300 for only 5100
